snippet: Larry Racioppo's bosses didn't want pretty pictures -- they wanted to show how bad the city's housing stock was. He delivered, documenting how the city's housing agency rebuilt entire neighborhoods.
abstract: Larry Racioppo's bosses didn't want pretty pictures -- they wanted to show how bad the city's housing stock was. He delivered, documenting how the city's housing agency rebuilt entire neighborhoods.

headline.main: Building an Archive From the Rubble
